technique.name: Step-Back Prompting
technique.description: First analyze general principles, then apply to specific task. Ask 'What are the key concepts?' before solving.
technique.paper: Take a Step Back: Evoking Reasoning via Abstraction in Large Language Models

technique.name: Role Prompting
technique.description: Assign expert role to the model. Start with 'You are an expert [role]...' — model adopts expertise and tone.
